articles.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever's Namor Explained - Who Is Tenoch Huerta's MCU Character? - IGN
articles.description: Tench Huerta is playing Marvel's very first superhero in Black Panther: Wakanda Forever. But why is Namor a villain in the MCU, and how will the movie draw on his decades of comic book history?
